{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3090448,"name":"garyk","username":"garyk","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/garyk/{size}/113200_2.png","created_at":"2022-10-20T00:29:06.699Z","cooked":"

At CapitalCityClassic this last weekend (Oct 14-16, 2022) there was discussion (rumors) of a Limelight 2+ replacement/upgrade/entirely new product. I’ve hunted around CD and the Web and haven’t find any reference to one.

Anybody know?

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":6,"updated_at":"2022-10-20T00:29:06.699Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":689,"reads":347,"readers_count":346,"score":3514.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":416386,"topic_slug":"limelight-2-replacement","display_username":"garyk","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":7232,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/limelight-2-replacement/416386/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3090450,"name":"Lyssia","username":"apotato","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/apotato/{size}/204534_2.png","created_at":"2022-10-20T00:39:09.129Z","cooked":"

Haven’t heard anything about limelight specifically but next year they are moving towards a new vision system based on apriltags. Right now limelight does not support these on the software side, but photonlib has a beta that does and can be loaded onto a limelight.

Is this what ur looking for? If not limelight hasn’t said much on the April tag topic, currently the software doesn’t support it, but LL can be flashed with open source software like photon vision which supports April tags.

[FRC Blog] 2022 Control System Reporting, 2023 Updates, and Beta Testing General Forum
Posted on the FRC Blog ,9/9/22 by Kevin O’Connor 2022 Control System Reporting, 2023 Updates, and Beta Testing Written by Kevin O’Connor, FIRST Robotics Competition Senior Robotics Engineer As all of you start gearing up for the 2023 season, the Control System Team is gearing up too! We’ve got a number of updates to share with you including Usage Reporting data from the 2022 season, two notes about vision targeting in the 2023 season, and information about Beta Testing. 2022 Usage Reporting T…
